about_the_game:
Cult of Persona is a clicker game dedicated to historical figures of the 20th century. In this game, you will battle using a pinball field By clicking, you trigger the generation of your warrior balls. You need to bring your army to victory - capture the enemy base. If you succeed, you will receive a random card featuring one of the historical characters.

See you on the battlefield, Persona!
detailed_description:
Card seasons

Dear Players,

We’re excited to share that once we reach our target player base, we will be poised to launch our Season 1 item cards, which you can preview in our game screenshots. We have already designed and prepared cards for four seasons, with new releases scheduled every three months. Please note that this timeline may be adjusted based on your feedback and preferences. We can’t wait to embark on this journey together!


Future Plans

Dear Players,

We have ambitious plans to enhance our gameplay! We're excited to introduce features like a Steam Workshop for custom maps and units, new units, and an expanded, dynamic pinball field. Additionally, we’re working on our magnum opus: a competitive multiplayer mode featuring unique traits, bonuses, depending on personality cards you could earn by playing.

The success of these plans relies on your support and enthusiasm for our project. We're a small team of passionate gamers who set out to create something simple yet enjoyable.

Dive into our concept, snag our beautiful cards early, and become part of a vibrant future (if we’re all fortunate enough to see it)!

short_description: Craft your strategy to outsmart your foes in the top-down marble game "Cult of Persona." Build a formidable army and gather unique cards that embody historical figures from World War II. Immerse yourself in tactical gameplay as you harness the strengths of these personas to secure victory!
